law.catch_line: Administration must be within ten years after death.
law.text: Original administration shall not be granted after the expiration of ten (10) years from the death of the testator or intestate and if made after that time, it shall be void.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3895.
